Tickets

Regular tickets

Combi €140 Buy combi ticket
Friday (9/8) €55 Buy Friday ticket
Saturday (10/8) €70 Buy Saturday ticket
Sunday (11/8) €70 Buy Sunday ticket

Vip tickets

VIP Combi €255 Buy combi VIP ticket
VIP Friday (9/8) €100 Buy Friday VIP ticket
VIP Saturday (10/8) €130,5 Buy Saturday VIP ticket
VIP Sunday (11/8) €130,5 Buy Sunday VIP ticket

Eagle's Plaza

Check camping page for mor info.

DIY camping package €115 Buy DIY package
Tipi tent €180 Rent Tipi tent
Bell tent 2p €250 Rent Bell tent 2p
Bell tent 4p €500 Rent Bell tent 4p

Camping tickets

Check camping page for mor info.

Camping €16 Buy caming ticket
Motor camping €25 Buy motor camping ticket
Camper camping €50 Buy camper camping ticket

Combi ticket holders have free access to the extra friday line up. Day tickets however are only valid on the given day. Friday, Saturday or Sunday, as from opening time.
The prices mentioned include all costs.

By law, ticket prices now include all service and payment fees. Although the initial ticket price seems higher than last year, the total ticket cost is not.
Ticketmaster support: 070 660 601 from 8am till 8pm (monday-saturday). Max. 30 cent/min. - help@ticketmaster.be - www.ticketmaster.be/help/
